text: Anthu okhala m’midzi amati, “Ife timakhulupirira.” Nena, “Inu mulibe chikhulupiriro. Koma nenani kuti, “Tadzipereka kwa Mulungu chifukwa chikhulupiriro sichidakhazikike m’mitima mwanu. Ndipo ngati inu mumvera Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake, Iye sadzachepetsa ntchito zanu, ngakhale m’pang’ono pomwe. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi wokhululukira nthawi zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha.”
